items.summary: Update frontend/src/pages/MyProjects.tsx to fetch real user projects from the backend using the useProjects hook instead of displaying mock data, showing actual project applications with real status indicators and project details

Update frontend/src/pages/SkillProfile.tsx to display actual user skills from backend using useUserProfile hook and persist skill changes using useSaveCallerUserProfile hook with proper form validation and success feedback

Update frontend/src/pages/Mentorship.tsx to fetch real contact requests using useContactRequests hook and enable sending messages using useSendContactRequest hook with proper message validation and confirmation feedback

Update frontend/src/pages/StudentSettings.tsx to load real user profile data using useUserProfile hook and save changes using useSaveCallerUserProfile hook with form validation, success notifications, and proper error handling

Update frontend/src/pages/Applicants.tsx to fetch real project applicants from the backend instead of using mock data, displaying actual student applications with real skill match percentages and contact functionality
Add backend methods in backend/main.mo to store and retrieve project applications, linking students to projects with application status (Applied, In Progress, Completed) and timestamp data

Update frontend/src/pages/IndustryAnalytics.tsx to display real analytics data from the backend including actual applicant counts, active project metrics, and engagement rates with proper data visualization
Add backend methods in backend/main.mo to calculate and return analytics metrics for industry partners including total applicants per project, active project counts, and engagement statistics
Update frontend/src/pages/IndustrySettings.tsx to load actual company profile data using useUserProfile hook and save changes using useSaveCallerUserProfile hook with validation and success feedback
Update frontend/src/pages/Users.tsx to fetch and display real platform users from the backend instead of mock data, with working search functionality and role-based filtering
Add backend query method in backend/main.mo to return all registered users with their profiles, roles, and registration timestamps, accessible only to admin users

Update frontend/src/pages/AdminProjects.tsx to fetch real platform projects from backend with actual approval status, implementing working approve/reject functionality that updates project status in the backend
Add backend methods in backend/main.mo to allow admins to approve or reject projects, updating project approval status and making approved projects visible to students

Update frontend/src/pages/Revenue.tsx to fetch and display actual platform revenue data from the backend including total revenue, monthly breakdown, and subscription statistics instead of placeholder mock data

Add backend data structures and methods in backend/main.mo to track platform revenue including subscription payments, revenue timestamps, and methods to calculate total and monthly revenue accessible to admin users only

Update frontend/src/pages/Reports.tsx to fetch real platform activity data from the backend including daily active users, project applications, and message counts with working date range filtering and JSON export functionality

Add backend methods in backend/main.mo to track and return platform activity metrics including daily active user counts, application statistics, and message counts with date range filtering for admin reporting

Update frontend/src/pages/AdminSettings.tsx to load actual platform configuration settings from the backend and enable saving configuration changes including site name, maintenance mode, and user access controls with persistence

Add backend data structure in backend/main.mo to store platform configuration settings including site name, maintenance mode flag, and registration settings with methods to get and update settings restricted to admin role
